channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Best Gifts for Book Lovers (2025): E-Readers, Cozy Accessories, Book Sets
item.description: Any one of these gift ideas will make your favorite bookworm very happy, from e-readers and accessories to cozy reading essentials.

item.title: La récente GoPro Lit Hero, une mini action cam avec éclairage intégré, est encore plus abordable qu’à sa sortie
item.description: GoPro a récemment lancé la version "Lit", avec un éclairage en façade, de sa caméra d'action d'entrée de gamme "Hero", dévoilée l'an dernier. Ultra légère et capable de filmer en 4K@60fps, cette GoPro Lit Hero est actuellement proposée à 249 euros au lieu de 269,99 euros chez Boulanger.

item.title: Samsung’s 40-Inch Odyssey G7 Monitor Is Big on Immersion and Trade-offs
item.description: Samsung's 40-inch, curved gaming monitor will fit the needs of those who prefer to play in a dark, dank place.

item.title: The Xgimi Horizon 20 Max is a bright, premium projector that's awesome for both movies and gaming
item.description: The Xgimi Horizon 20 Max is a superb portable 4K projector. It may be pricey, but it's worth it.

item.title: I tested out the Doogee V Max Play - a monster rugged phone built for adventurers (and weight-lifters)
item.description: This rugged phone is half a house brick of Android power.

item.title: What Are Gravel Running Shoes? (2025)
item.description: This new-ish hybrid between trail runners and road runners is designed for less technical terrain and the occasional road run.

item.title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2025 - Stream Formula 1 finale with this trial offer
item.description: Here's a quick guide on how you can stream the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix live using a free trial as Norris, Piastri and Verstappen battle it out for the Drivers' Championship title.

item.title: How to watch Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2025 F1: live streams, schedule, preview, starting grid, Verstappen on pole ahead of Norris and Piastri
item.description: All the ways to watch Abu Dhabi Grand Prix live streams online and from anywhere, as Norris, Verstappen and Piastri battle for the title in the 2025 F1 finale.

item.title: How do you turn a baseball infield into a tennis court? It’s as complicated as it sounds
item.description: To prepare for the new star-studded Miami Invitational exhibition tournament, engineers built a tennis court on top of the Miami Marlins home field. Tennis is experiencing a resurgence, with almost 26 million people playing in the U.S. alone. That number has been on an upward trajectory five years in a row. While the sport’s renewed cultural relevance can be attributed to multiple factors, brands across fashion, entertainment, and even sports leagues like Major League Baseball are capitalizing on the trend through unconventional opportunities....

item.title: Housing market shift: Zillow’s updated ratings show the power balance in 250-plus metros
item.description: Where home sellers—and buyers—have the most power right now, according to Zillow’s updated analysis. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Nouveauté Google Pixel, le PC « parfait » et Netflix rachète Warner Bros… – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Comme chaque dimanche, nous faisons le point sur les actualités qui vous ont le plus marqué ces derniers jours. Au menu : le rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix, une nouveauté Pixel et le PC parfait de Linus Torvalds.
